title: REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED
content:
0x4899CB088EDF59B80x9C37F220// RemoveWeaponFromPed
void REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED(Ped ped, Hash weaponHash);This native removes a specified weapon from your selected ped.  
Weapon Hashes: pastebin.com/0wwDZgkF  
Example:  
C#:  
Function.Call(Hash.REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED, Game.Player.Character, 0x99B507EA);  
C++:  
WEAPON::REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 0x99B507EA);  
The code above removes the knife from the player.
codeBlocks:
// RemoveWeaponFromPed
void REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED(Ped ped, Hash weaponHash);

This native removes a specified weapon from your selected ped.  
Weapon Hashes: pastebin.com/0wwDZgkF  
Example:  
C#:  
Function.Call(Hash.REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED, Game.Player.Character, 0x99B507EA);  
C++:  
WEAPON::REMOVE_WEAPON_FROM_PED(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 0x99B507EA);  
The code above removes the knife from the player.
